attributes.action: With immediate effect place disgraced, soon to be ex, PM Tony Blair on trial for treason.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In 1997 things were glum in good old Blighty, but then, along came a man by the name of Tony Blair. With youth, vigour and a whole heap of good ideas for or once great land, he was duly elected as prime minister.
Since then this man has turned his back on the people that elected him, in favour of mass immigration, globalisation and become a puppet for 'Big Buissness' in order to maximise profits and drive down wages.
He was elected to serve the interests of the British people, and he failed to do so.  This Country has never been in so much turmoil and its all down to Mr Blair.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
